title: Drive by bike!
description: If possible, take the bike instead of other means of transport!
reason: Driving the bike is a good way to environmentally friendly transportation, without any CO2 emissions.

title: Close the water tap!
description: Close the water tap ad fast as possible! Don't let water run if you don't need it.
